en.Text:
Welcome to a new beginning! ECLISE Alpha 2 contains:
- Reworked adventures up to 11-10 (with the respective Hard Mode)
- Reworked reward progression
- Reworked plant boost system
- Just generally a shit ton of new stuff and bug fixes
Good luck on your journey, Gardeners. May victory and enjoyment be with you.
